channel.title: Help me, fixing armour tab [317 delta]
channel.description:
[317][delta] any1 got a link to a tutorial that shows how to set up working bank pins, or any1 wanna explain how to lol
when ever i click my armour tab, my entire client freezes, i have to close the client and reopen it. anyone got any idea how to fix this or why this might be happening.
and any1 got a tutorial or wanna tell me how to change the wan an npc faces (not all npc's just certain ones)
thanks

item.title: Help me, fixing armour tab [317 delta]
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

The Wanderer:

When you client freezes it should post an error in the client cmd. Post that here, although I am guessing that it is because you are requesting a null interface.

nothing happens in the client cmd, i log in it says login finished, i click the tab and it says after about 10 seconds player saved, player disconnected

Read full topic
item.source: Help me, fixing armour tab [317 delta]
